blogPost.title: Does society need a new social contract? The Economist’s editor-in-chief @zannymb asks @ECB president Christine @Lagarde on “The Economist Asks” podcast https://t.co/3TH1rNpM9Z https://t.co/KjrVjx9Ibd
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 社会是否需要一个新的社会契约？经济学人》主编@zannymb在 "经济学人问 "播客中问@欧洲央行行长Christine @Lagarde：https://t.co/3TH1rNpM9Z https://t.co/KjrVjx9Ibd。
社會是否需要一個新的社會契約？經濟學人》主編@zannymb在 "經濟學人問 "播客中問@歐洲央行行長Christine @Lagarde：https://t.co/3TH1rNpM9Z https://t.co/KjrVjx9Ibd。

previous.title: In the struggle between democracy and dictatorship, it is crucial that democracies tell the truth in plain language. China is committing crimes against humanity in Xinjiang. That is different from genocide https://t.co/CoqJhmrCPB

localize.full_text: 在民主与独裁之间的斗争中，民主国家必须以通俗的语言说出真相。中国在新疆犯下了危害人类罪。这不同于种族灭绝罪https://t.co/CoqJhmrCPB。
在民主與獨裁之間的鬥爭中，民主國家必須以通俗的語言說出真相。中國在新疆犯下了危害人類罪。這不同於種族滅絕罪https://t.co/CoqJhmrCPB。

next.title: In the past year women have been murdered for such offences as wearing make-up and chatting online. Last month a Saudi woman was killed by her brothers for having a Snapchat account https://t.co/fKdXisRrTt

localize.full_text: 在过去的一年里，女性因化妆和在线聊天等罪行被谋杀。上个月，一名沙特妇女因拥有一个Snapchat账户而被其兄弟杀害，https://t.co/fKdXisRrTt。
在過去的一年裏，女性因化妝和在線聊天等罪行被謀殺。上個月，一名沙特婦女因擁有一個Snapchat賬戶而被其兄弟殺害，https://t.co/fKdXisRrTt。
